name: Delivery & Beyond
description:
Created for Github's Game off 2022  --- Cliche: Signed, Sealed, Delivered

# QA

How to start:

  • Press the button next to the computer to begin.

I can't press buttons:

  • Make sure you are not holding a item, place it back and then try again.

How do I get rid of items:

  • Some items can be trashed on the trash. Else you are forced to use them.

## -- 

# Controls (Keyboard):

  • E to pickup / place items
  • Mouse1 to use usable items
  • Mouse2 to zoom
  • Shift to run
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • ESC to open options menu

# Controls (Controller):

  • Square (ps) / X (xbox) to pickup / place items
  • X (ps) / A (xbox) to use usable items
  • R2 to zoom
  • L2 to run
  • Left joystick to move
  • Right joystick to look around
  • START to open options menu

Source code available at : https://github.com/edunad/delivery---beyond

Have fun!
